list_definition.definition: a substance used for sticking things together

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That glue will not stick plastic to wood.
Glue the two pieces of cardboard together.

list_ex_of_english: Each presentation of a surface can be reduced to a singleton by inverse and gluing operations since a surface is connected.
Birds and rodent dishes were glued to the top of long plastic cylinders and set 2-3 cm above the ground surface.
Intelligent systems are built by "glueing together" different sources of behaviour which, when conceived as a whole, are perceived as intelligent by the user.
When sherds were glued together to form complete or par tial vessel, they were counted as a single sherd in the sherd counts.
A triangular piece of cardboard was glued to the wax above the frontal part of the thorax.
Templates designed to be valid over the whole spectral range must be based on both types of data properly "glued" together.
The test time for buffing the side of the shoe took 16 s, and the side of the shoe was buffed appropriately for gluing.
A filter paper glued to the lid of the petri dish was moistened with distilled water to maintain humidity.
